attributes.action: make prescriptions free of charge for patients who have C.O.P.D
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment patients with various stages of C.O.P.D have to pay for their prescriptions which for the many tablets ,nebulisers and inhalers is very costly each month. For this progressive illness I propose that their prescriptions shopuls be free of charge,
